title: Charles-Tim
author: Charles-Tim
created_time: August 11, 2023, 02:17:36 PMLast edit: March 02, 2025, 10:28:10 PM by Charles-Tim
content: You are free to ask questions here as a newbie. We are going to give you answers to your questions.1. Obey the forum and local board rulesUnofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQUnofficial General Guidelines For Posting( Na de koko dem)2. Merit, activity, rank, position and badgesMerit and activity FAQ: Everything you need to know about forum 'activity, account ranks and meritForum ranks/positions/badges (What do those shiny coins under my name mean?)3. Staking of bitcoin addressAs you have already registered on this forum, it is good to stake you bitcoin address. You can do that here: Stake your Bitcoin address hereStaking of your bitcoin address is used to claim the owner of a bitcoin address. It is good to stake it on this forum because if your Bitcointalk account is compromised or hacked, it can be used to recover back your Bitcointalk account. You can not use an exchange address or a centralized platform address for staking because private key is used to generate the digital signature. You need a noncustodial wallet for it.Recommended wallets for stakingBitcoin CoreElectrumBluewalletSparrowWhat you will stake are:your bitcoin addressyour message (you can write anything you like, like your name but including the date you are signing it)and the digital signatureYou can stake your address to prove the ownership of your Bitcointalk account which can be important during Bitcointalk account recovery, borrowing of money, trading and changing of address in a signature campaign.4. The use of the forum search engine for local boardFor Google search:For people that will prefer google search, you can use this for the search:Code:<topic title> Nigeria (Naija) - Bitcointalk</topic title>For forum search:At the left upper corner of this forum is a search space which you can use to search for topics. You can search for topics to know if the topic is already existing on this forum, to learn from the topic and the whole thread or to avoid thread duplication. But this is more about local board and I will be more specific to let you know how to know the threads that are existing on this local board which is the second forum search engine that you will see at the upper right corner on this forum which is beside 'home', 'help' or 'profile', 'my messages ' that are all written within blue color. Click on the search -> write the topic you are searching for 'on search for'. At the down part, click on 'choose a board to search in, or search all' after you uncheck 'check all'. Look for Nigeria (Naija) and check ✔️ it and scroll down to click on search.             Before posting any topic or creating a new thread, you can use the search engines to know if there are existing topics already. You can use it to learn from existing topics as well.Searching if recent occurrence has been created on local board, to avoid duplicating topic Important info: [Guide] Searching effectively5. Ninjastic.spaceNinjastic.space - BitcoinTalk Post/Address archive + APIhttps://ninjastic.spaceThe main reason I included this is because many forum members said it can be used as a better search engine. All you have to do is to go to the website, click on the menu at the upper left corner, click on posts and search for the topic or post that you want to search for.Ninjastic.space has many other functions. It is good for looking for deleted posts, checking of users bitcoin wallet or altcoin wallet addresses posted on this forum, even if it has been deleted. It can also be used to look for user's posts on the boards the user is very active, this can be done through the user ID. It has other functions and worth visiting.6. Signature and AvatarTo add signature, click on your profile -> forum profile information at the left side -> you will see a big space to paste the signature code that you copied. To add avatar, at the upper part of the big space to input your signature code, click on 'go here' to upload your avatar.To add avatar, you must be a full member. Any rank below full member can not wear an avatar. The higher your rank, the bigger your signature space.Quote from: Amphenomenon on October 19, 2023, 09:01:46 PMAvatar and signature:  [Guide] Factors to consider before joining paid signature campaigns.BTT SIGNATURE FROM SCRATCH - by a guy who learnt to don't bother the devs7. How to upload imagesTo be able to upload image on Bitcointalk, you need to rank up to junior member or buy a copper membership. Recommended image uploading site: https://www.talkimg.com/TalkImg.com - Image hosting for BitcoinTalkGuide: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5462934.msg63066374#msg63066374Other image uploading sites:Image uploading websites/ scripts for Bitcointalk users8. Notifications, of new topics, replies, mentions and meritsReplies in this regard means any other posts aside topics. For the forum's notification, the notifications are sent to the email you used to register on this forum.Notification of new topicThis forum has notification for topics and replies. If you want to be notified of new topic on a particular board, go to the board, you will see 'notify' beside 'new topic'. I am referring to new topic which you can click on to create and post a topic. Click on notify. With this, you will be notified of new topic that is posted on that board. The notification will be sent to your email.Note: If you do not visit a new topic that you have been notified on a particular board through the email, you will no longer get notifications on the board until you visit the board.Notification of new replyOn the thread you want to be notified of new replies, you will see 'notify' beside 'reply' (the reply you can click on to make new post), click on it (I mean click on 'notify' that is beside 'reply'. But ones you have been notified of the next post and you do not visit the thread, you will no longer get notification of other replies on the thread until you visit the thread again, but I think that is good because it will not create disturbance.Ninjastic Telegram bot notification of topics, merits, mentions and repliesIf you want to be notified of merits and mentions, this will be very helpful. You can also use it to track a thread, but the notifications may be disturbing if you track a thread with it because as people are posting on the thread, you will be getting the notification of each single post.Ninjastic telegram bot can now be used for notification of topics.[TELEGRAM] Yet Another BitcoinTalk Notification BOT (merits, mentions, topics,+)https://t.me/BTTSuperNotifier_botLoyceV notifications of mentions and following of users:The first link will be about notification of mentions. If you are mentioned in a post, you will be notified. The second link will be about you following a user on this forum, in a way that if the person reply under a thead, you will be notified or if the person post a topic, you will be be notified. To enable this, you have to read the second link and see what to do to get notification of new topics or replies of the user that you wish to be notified of.LoyceV's notification bot (7 days retroactive)LoyceV's: Follow users on Bitcointalk.org (posts and/or topics)

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Most newbies have no idea about the merit and activity numbers, so I will leave the link below. They must all understand that regardless of merit, you must still reach certain months in order to earn a specific rank. For example, to achieve the required Activity point to obtain the Legendary rank (only those with the required merit), a user must be active for a period of two years.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0Quote from: RahimNda on August 12, 2023, 09:14:31 PMI have a questions? what are the things newbies should do to earn more merit, and what is the advantages of merit, also and also what should encourage the newbies to get more post.we are new in the forum so we still need, some guide so that we can meet up with our daily post. Simple! You should read more if you want to become more knowledgeable. You are not obligated to post a certain number of times every day, so don't worry about it. However, keep in mind that your Activity point is determined by the total number of posts you have made.

comments.body: @WiwoYou created an already existing post an hour later. From the look of the two topic titles, you may not see it on Google maybe because the thread is new and definitely because the titles are not similar.What to do next time:It is about exchange maintenance which if someone create such topic, it would likely be today (or less than 2 days ago) because the maintenance started few hours ago. Use the forum search engine instead, 'change it from match all words' to 'match any words'. The message age should be between 0 to 1 day (or 2 days) for the obvious reason I pointed to already, and check ✔️ only Nigeria and search.This is what you will see with maybe few other suggestions:Mate2237 topic is the second while yours is the first. Supposing you have not created the topic, you would have seen Mate2237 topic on top instead.This applies to topics created not long because the longer the days the topic is created, the greater the inaccuracy and inability to see what you are looking for.Edit:Alternatively, you can check the topics created recently on the first page of the local board and you can easily know if similar topic has been created or not.
